timeline.message:
- Fix duplicate queries problem
- Query evaluation should depend on object resolution (e.g. part/type in
mono-part mode)
- Query symbolic name is defined from SB code

Change-Id: Ie66aa419def26c9ee44ebd9bed41ca2af8e022be
Signed-off-by: Tu Ton <minhtutonthat@gmail.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This class uses the singleton pattern, and all the other methods are not static.
I think we should be remain coherent with that.
timeline.author: sandupostaru

timeline.bodyText:
I think we can do a map on allInterfaces to obtain the names of all the classes and convert the collection to a Set.
We can then avoid re-traversing the allInterfaces collection a second time, and just do interfaceNames.contains(cassFQN1) && interfaceNames.contains(cassFQN2) instead
timeline.author: sandupostaru
